title: Is COVID-19 a roadblock towards achieving SDGs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. The economy is down, unemployment and poverty levels have increased. So it is a road block and economy will take time to be back on road. So development goals also will take time to be on track.

These are the Sustainable Development Goals The 17 Sustainable Development Goals are: No PovertyZero HungerGood Health and Well-beingQuality EducationGender EqualityClean Water and SanitationAffordable and Clean EnergyDecent Work and Economic GrowthIndustry, Innovation, and InfrastructureReducing InequalitySustainable Cities and CommunitiesResponsible Consumption and ProductionClimate ActionLife Below WaterLife On LandPeace, Justice, and Strong InstitutionsPartnerships for the GoalsIt is self-evident that countries can not achieve them when the GDP of all countries had a big set back
